name: swan

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
SWAN is a third-generation wave model, developed at Delft University of
Technology, that computes random, short-crested wind-generated waves in
coastal regions and inland waters. For more information about SWAN, see
a short overview of model features. This list reflects on the scientific
relevance of the development of SWAN.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
Intel MPI Library is a multifabric message-passing library that
implements the open-source MPICH specification. Use the library to
create, maintain, and test advanced, complex applications that perform
better on high-performance computing (HPC) clusters based on Intel
processors. LICENSE INFORMATION: By downloading and using this software,
you agree to the terms and conditions of the software license agreements
at https://intel.ly/393CijO.

dependencies.name: netcdf-fortran
dependencies.description:
NetCDF (network Common Data Form) is a set of software libraries and
machine-independent data formats that support the creation, access, and
sharing of array-oriented scientific data. This is the Fortran
distribution.

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.
